channel.title: Cammy-Pvp Source Help
channel.description:
Well.. I'm Trying To Code And Start Of A "Cammy-Pvp" Source..
But The Annoying Thing Is That Everywhere I Go "Its In The Wild"..
How Do I Fix That So Only "In The Wild" Peoples Can Fight? :confused:

item.title: Cammy-Pvp Source Help
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

Safezone Boolean:
add more as you’d like by using “||” to separate safezones. to do a box of coordinates use: (coordY >= SW Y Coord) && (coordY <= NE Y Coord) && (coordX <= NE X Coord) && (coordX >= SW X Coord)

public boolean isInPvP(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((coordX <= 2491) && (coordX >= 2441)){ return true; } return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Cammy-Pvp Source Help
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

well safe area is removed so your going have to figure out to put safe area back that isnt a really good source if you want economy? im guessing try pi but if you still want this one im not stopping you but you will have to put safe area back to the whole server. There might be a boolean making it pvp but its probly safe area removed =p
